quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: I never lose. I either win or learn.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: Unknown

quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
author: Unknown

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Unknown

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
author: Unknown

quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Your crown has been bought and paid for. Put it on your head and wear it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer.
author: Harriet Tubman

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I’m not afraid of storms, for I’m learning how to sail my ship.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Work hard in silence. Let your success be your noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can't go on but you keep going anyway.
author: Unknown

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: I am my best work – a series of road maps, reports, recipes, doodles, and prayers from the front lines.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: Success isn’t about how much money you make. It’s about the difference you make in people’s lives.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: I thrive on obstacles. If I’m told that it can’t be told, then I push harder.
author: Issa Rae

quote: It’s not the load that breaks you down, it’s the way you carry it.
author: Lena Horne

quote: You define your own life. Don’t let other people write your script.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Don’t be afraid to be ambitious about your goals. Hard work never stops. Neither should your dreams.
author: Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson

quote: When you undervalue what you do, the world will undervalue who you are.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: You don't make progress by standing on the sidelines, whimpering and complaining. You make progress by implementing ideas.
author: Shirley Chisholm

quote: Make your life a masterpiece; imagine no limitations on what you can be, have or do.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Never be limited by other people’s limited imaginations.
author: Dr. Mae Jemison

quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: I’m deliberate and afraid of nothing.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Hard things will happen to us. We will recover. We will learn from it. We will grow more resilient because of it.
author: Taylor Richardson
